package com.Operators;

public class Addition {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
      int a =10;
      int b =30;
      float e=20.23f;
      
      //sum=a+b=40
      //system.out.println(sum);.
      System.out.println(a+b);
 double c=10.8;
 double d=5;
 System.out.println(c-d);
 System.out.println("Addition of the A & E"+(a+e));// + is the used the addition and concatetion.concatetion is used to the two string concate.
	}

}
